Today, the Causeway Coast is lighting up with 4 ft @11s WNW swell and light 9 mph SSE winds. White Park Bay and Portballintrae are the go-to spots, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 3 ft @6s S swell and fresh 24 mph S winds, making it less favorable. The day after continues the trend with similar poor conditions. Best: today.
